page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: Many recreational activities and events take place at Roundhay Park. Areas are assigned for crown green bowls, cricket, and football training. The large grass arena is used for cycling, jogging, marathons, and field events; the two lakes for fishing, boating, windsurfing and regattas. Events such as the Leeds Flower Show and bonfire night celebrations are held yearly. The park is also the venue for various other events which include pop and brass band concerts, fairs, civil war battles, police day and charity fundraising. People use the park for walks, picnics, visiting the flower gardens feeding the ducks and geese, and fishing in the lakes. The Mansion House is now a restaurant catering for weddings and functions A new lakeside cafe supplies all year refreshments.
